errorName.specialC: Firstname/Lastname must only contain letters without spaces
errorName.tooMuchC: Firstname/Lastname can not contain more than 18 characters
errorName.tooLowC: Firstname/Lastname must contain at least 3 characters

errorPwd.atleast6: Password must contain at least 6 characters

errorMakingAccount: Error making an account, please try again

forgot.heading: Did you forgot your password ?
forgot.desc: Please enter your email adress to reset your password. You will receive an email with a reset link.

failureQRregister: Failure while registration, please contact support
noJetons: If you are the owner of this QR, please sign in to recharge your QR via the dashboard.
chooseRelais: If you are the owner of this QR, please finish the registration and choose the pickup parcelshop via the dashboard.

select.heading: Pickup parcelshop
select.desc: Please enter the zip code in order to select the parcelshop in which your lost item will be delivered.
select.success: The pickup point has been chosen
select.errLoc: Please enter a valid ZIP code

found.h1: Help us get it back to its owner and get a reward from us
found.li1: Just deposit the lost item to the nearest pickup parcelshop point.
found.li2: By clicking on 'GENERATE', a QR code will be made. This can take up to 15 minutes
found.li3: Show the generated QR code to the pickup parcelshop that you will choose in the next page. Don't forget to pack the object. The list of pickup parcelshop around your ZIP code will be shown, you can deposit the item to any of them.
found.optB: I want an amount of 3 euros to be transfered to a NGO.
found.optA: I want to get rewarded by an amount of 3 euros.
found.errorRew: Please enter your fullname and your IBAN
found.qrGeneration: The QR code will appear in max 15 minutes
found.qrGenerated: Please deposit the packed item with this QR code to the nearest pickup point
found.errorIBAN: Please enter a valid BE IBAN
